text: Chromium oxide can refer to any of these compounds: *Chromium(II) oxide, basic, reducing agent, black *Chromium(III) oxide, basic, unreactive, green *Chromium(IV) oxide, black, crystalline, hard to make *Chromium(VI) oxide, acidic, strong oxidizing agent, red, toxic ==Related pages== *Chromic acid, a mixture of chromium(VI) oxide and water
title: Chromium oxide
